body: Wow, I remember when I first read this almost ten years ago, I was still a student, and now I have the books on my bookshelf, one of the best yuri with a plot I read.
Lmao here comes the trannies thinking that being uncomfortable during puberty means they're trans. Fuck off.
This belongs on a general manga site not here. You'll have an easier time nutting to a drawing of four circles touching each other.
There's always the possibility that Yae is a FtM trans man considering just how much dysphoria she feels from the feminine parts of her body and when people characterize her as feminine
